summary.span: 表示对一组列的限制，列中的所有值必须是唯一的。

span.span: Represents a restriction on a set of columns in which all values must be unique.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或强制实施的单个列 （列） 以确保主键值是唯一的。The is enforced on a single column (or columns) to ensure that a primary key value is unique. 约束不会强制执行，除非属性设置为`true`。Constraints are not enforced unless the property is set to `true`. 当与第二个合并，约束不会强制执行，直到完成所有合并。When the a is merged with a second , constraints are not enforced until all merges are completed. ## Examples 以下示例将添加到，并设置属性设置为`true`。The following example adds a to a and sets the property to `true`. [!code-vb[Classic WebData UniqueConstraint Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData UniqueConstraint Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型是适用于多线程读取操作。

span.span: This type is suitable for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 你必须同步的任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数提供在 Visual Studio.NET 环境中的设计时支持。This constructor is provided for design time support in the Visual Studio .NET environment. 因此，使用此构造函数创建的 对象必须通过 添加到集合中。 objects created by using this constructor must then be added to the collection via . 具有指定名称的列必须在调用该方法时，或者如果之前调用此构造函数中，具有指定名称的列时必须存在名为的调用。Columns with the specified names must exist at the time the method is called, or if has been called prior to calling this constructor, the columns with the specified names must exist at the time that is called.

span.span: , if the contraints are equal; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它们约束相同的列，则两个约束相等。Two constraints are equal if they constrain the same columns. ## Examples 下面的示例比较两个 UiqueConstraint 对象。The following example compares two UiqueConstraint objects. summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示约束是否在主键上。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether or not the constraint is on a primary key.

value.span: 如果约束在主键上，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: , if the constraint is on a primary key; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表通常包括可确保每个行都是唯一的主键。A table usually includes a primary key that ensures every row is unique. 在某些表中，可能的多个列组成的主键。In some tables, the primary key may be made up of more than one column. 例如，可能这两个的第一个和最后一个名称也进行包含名称的表的主键。For example, a primary key for a table containing names might be made up of both the first and last names as well. 要使用多个列创建主键，请将列属性设置为 DataColumn 对象的数组中。To create a primary key with more than one column, set the Columns property to an array of DataColumn objects. ## Examples 以下示例检查属性。The following example checks the property. [!code-vb[Classic WebData UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData UniqueConstraint.IsPrimaryKey Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Adding Constraints to a Table
